page.title: 04A DAY AT PARK ROAD SCHOOL 2
page.content: SOME READING FOR PLEASURE AND AT 11.50 , MISS MULLIGAN TOLD US ABOUT THE TRIP WE WERE GOING ON. THEN AT 12.00 IT WAS DINNERTIME; SANDWICH EATERS WERE ALLOWED TO SIT ON THE LAWNS. IN THE AFTERNOON, THE NEXT LESSON WAS TARGETS: THE SUBJECT WAS SCHOOL.THIS LESSON WENT ON TILL ABOUT 3 P.M. WE THEN ALL WENT INSIDE TO LISTEN TO THE END OF {"THE IRON MAN"}_ THAT WAS A GOOD STORY! WE ALL WENT HOME AT 3.30 P.M. IT IS THEN TIME FOR THE CLEANERS TO COME. THEY CLEAN THE FLOORS AND THE TOILETS. MR. JACKSON THEN LOCKS ALL THE DOORS AND THE SCHOOL IS READY FOR THE NEXT DAY!
